title: Central location in Aurora. 1 Bed, 1 Bath! Stop by for a tour!

Walk-In Closets', 'About the community:', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'At IMT Dayton Station Apartments in Aurora, CO, location is everything.', 'We are just steps away from the Commuter RTD Light Rail and Denver Tech Center, and just 20 minutes to DIA as well as easy access to I-225 and I-25.', "Our one, two and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes for rent feature 9' ceilings, spacious closets, and in-home washer/dryer.", 'Premium apartments are available with stainless steel appliances, designer backsplash, and granite counters.', 'Relax at one of our two pools, get a workout in at the fitness studio or mingle with all types of friends at our popular dog park.', 'You can also enjoy time outdoors at nearby Cherry Creek Reservoir and Kennedy Golf Course or shopping at Park Meadows Mall.', 'Browse our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and visit us today for your personal tour!', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property
